mutants.code:
def calculate_total_lemonade_drunk(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        n = case['n']
        m = case['m']
        P = case['P']
        rooms = case['rooms']
        arr = []
        for room in rooms:
            arr.append([room[0]] + sorted(room[1:]))
        drink = 1
        for visit in P:
            if len(arr[visit]) > 1:
                drink += arr[visit][-1]
                arr[visit].pop()
        results.append(drink)
    return results
